name: Deep Dive (Mascott)
description:
"You didn't understand everything.

But you knew what you needed to do."

Deep Dive is a short and strange text-adventure. As a young member of an endangered colony, you've been sent out to retrieve a device that will save the lives of everyone you know in the only home you've ever known. Designed, written, and programmed in Java by students at Rutgers University.
